attributes.action: Traffic lights at existing zebra crossing at St Patricks Park
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to get the zebra crossing (located accross from St Patricks Park in Kilsyth) replaced by traffic lights!
Cars don't stop even though they are supposed to, it's shocking. It's going to take a death before the council do something! So now is YOUR chance to help! Sign this petition pass it on and help get us the traffic lights!

rejection.details: The creator may wish to petition the local transport authority on this.
